titles.title: Mayflower Oil Spill Tax Relief Act of 2013
To exclude from gross income compensation provided for victims of the March 29, 2013, pipeline oil spill in Mayflower, Arkansas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/18/2013--Introduced. Mayflower Oil Spill Tax Relief Act of 2013 - Excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, any compensation provided to or for the benefit of a victim of the pipeline rupture and oil spill in Mayflower, Arkansas, on March 29, 2013.
